name: Woocommerce Wallet System
author: AceWebx Team

sections.description:
This powerful plugin enhances your online payment experience by seamlessly integrating with WooCommerce, allowing users to add funds directly to their wallets. Unlock the convenience of managing transactions effortlessly through the wallet feature, all made possible with the indispensable support of the WooCommerce plugin. Embrace the future of online payments with our feature-rich plugin. Get started by installing WooCommerce and unlocking the full potential of this dynamic tool.

⚡️ FEATURES

  • Money Wallet
  • Direct Checkout with Wallet
  • WooCommerce Support
sections.installation:
1. Navigate to the “Plugins” Menu in WordPress.
  2. Search for “WooCommerce Wallet System.”
  3. Click “Install.”
  4. Click “Activate.”
  5. You need to add another payment method to facilitate the addition of money to the wallet.
sections.faq:
Can money be added directly to the wallet?

Yes, you can directly add money to the wallet.

Where can we view our wallet?

You can view your wallet in the account details section.

Where can I report a bug?

Please report bugs, suggest ideas, and participate in development by emailing us at developer@acewebx.com.
